name: Harold in the (UNTESTED)
description:
LINK TO BUG REPORT FORM

Hello! I am Harold! I am on a quest for immortality to offer the Amulet of Yendor to the gods!

Warning: The game may be missing content and is under construction! Feedback is greatly appreciated! Help support indie devs!
